title: [Large-scale] Ethical Design and Utilization of Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Data-driven instructional design and basic statistical analysis experience
context.additional_context: In the mathematics curriculum, applying learning analytics requires strengthening design capabilities that consider ethical issues (privacy protection, prevention of data misuse, etc.) when collecting and interpreting learner data.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain three or more ethical issues that may arise during the collection and processing of learning analytics data.
Learners can design ethics guidelines for data utilization in mathematics learning environments.
Learners can propose analysis processes applying personal information protection and anonymization techniques in large-scale learner datasets.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
